topic.title: Secure DNS: Encrypted DNS name resolution requests with DNS-over-HTTPS
topic.shortdesc: DNS Client in Windows Server 2022 now supports DNS-over-HTTPS DoH which encrypts DNS queries using the HTTPS protocol. This helps keep your traffic as private as possible by preventing eavesdropping and your DNS data being manipulated. Learn more about configuring the DNS client to use DoH../networking/dns/doh-client-support.md.
